programme.title: Imet tabamas
programme.desc: Saates püütakse anda läbilõige Evald Hermaküla ühest päevast teatris. Sekka mõtteid ja arvamusi elust, Tartust ja muidugi teatrist. Autor ja saatejuht Urmas Ott. Režissöör Norma Jõekalda, toimetaja Anne Tuuling.(n)

programme.title: Rudolf ja Irma
A.H. Tammsaare
programme.desc: A. H. Tammsaare „Elu ja armastus” jõudis esmakordselt lugejate ette oktoobris 1934. Raamatul, milles teineteisele vastu seatakse tõsine armastus ja tegeliku elu närusus, on täpne pealkiri ja ajatu sisu. Ennekõike on ajatu peategelaste Irma ja Rudolfi armastuse lugu. Autor võtab peensusteni läbi armastuse ja abieluga seotud nüansid, seletab armastuse toimemehhanisme. 50 aastat hiljem pärast romaani ilmumist kirjutas teose põhjal stsenaariumi ja lavastas Gunnar Kilgas. Telelavastuse nimiosades mängivad Evald Hermaküla ja Elle Kull. Teistes osades Aleksander Eelmaa, Leida Rammo, Viire Valdma, Ita Ever, Ines Aru jt. Kunstnik Tiiu Übi, toimetaja Terje Põder.(n)

programme.title: De-Lovely
programme.desc: A biography of Cole Carter, his musical works and his unusual relationship with his wife.

programme.desc: Two con men try to resolve the rivalry between them through a bet, by picking a young girl who inherited fifty thousand dollars to be their target. Whoever deceives her and takes the money first, is the winner.

programme.desc: When John Connor, Human Resistance leader, launches a final attack on Skynet (a global artificial intelligence operating system called "Genisys" leading a machines' rise against mankind), Skynet sends a T-800 Terminator to 1987 to kill Sarah, John's mother. Kyle, John's right-hand man, follows the T-800 and Sarah re-programmes it into "Pops" to form a team in a deadly adventure to destroy Genisys.(c)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: After chasing and hunting down hundreds of criminals, Frank Castle "The Punisher" confronts his strongest and most fierce enemy yet: "Jigsaw.(c)

programme.desc: A contaminated chicken nugget causes a zombie virus to spread across an elementary school. A group of misfit teachers is forced to fight for their lives as the school gets run over by zombified children.(c)

programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: The film tells the story of a group of firefighters from the city of Prescott, Arizona, who responded to a massive fire in the city of Yarnell in June 2013, where the fires reached 19 members from the fire department team.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Base on a true story, that took place on January 15, 2009, when the American pilot (Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger) who managed to forced landing his plane above the Hudson River and saved the lives of 155 passengers on the plane, but despite his heroism and large risk in landing on the Hudson River, the disaster didn't end, where blowing winds from the authorities may destroy the live of the pilot himself.

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: The town of Silverton is devastated by a wave of deadly tornadoes, and storm trackers predict the worst is yet to come. Meanwhile, a group of high school students document the events and aftermath of the disaster.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: The strong-willed women of the Weston family find themselves heading back to their childhood Oklahoma house, and the eccentric woman who raised them, following a family crisis. The events reveal many aspects of this family and the problems facing the women and their mother.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A marine finds a picture in Iraq that helps him survive the dramatic battles. Getting back home, he tracks the girl in the picture which leads him to Louisiana. There he meets her and tries to explain his motives to find her.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Bored with his routine duties, Chris Burnett goes off course to check out a suspicious target, but when he gets spotted, Burnett becomes the target of the Serbian forces which are acting in breach of the peace treaty, and his last hope is for his commander to launch a rescue mission.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A German/American plane goes out on a secret mission, but crashes in a forest during the Laos bombing of 1965. The plane's crew are taken as hostages and tortured by Vietcong forces. US Navy Pilot successfully plans an escape method for the hostages, but they face plenty of unforeseen events.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A play-off on John Sturge's 1960 film "The Magnificent Seven". The movie is set at the end of the nineteenth century, about a group of people being held inside a ruined building because of a rough snowstorm. Rath (Kurt Russell), who works as an bounty hunter, was escorting Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh) to court and gets encountered by four strangers.(c)

programme.title: Live By Night
programme.desc: Set in 1962 Boston, where alcohol flows and bullets fly, a single man decides to leave his mark on the world when he discovers a world of underground distilleries, bars, gangs and corrupt police officers. In the meantime the son of a known police officer turns his back on his strict upbringing and gets involved with a dangerous mob.(c)

programme.title: You're Not You
programme.desc: A classical pianist named Kate develops amyotrophic sclerosis, her social and psychological condition worsens, especially after her marriage is about to fail. She meets aspiring rock singer Bec, who volunteers to take care of her. Despite Kate's total reliance on Bec, they each have a different outlook on life.(c)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: Howard Inlet, a successful New York advertising executive, suffers a great tragedy and retreats from his social life. While his concerned friends try desperately to reconnect with him, he seeks answers from the universe by writing letters to Love, Time and Death. But it's not until his notes bring unexpected responses from three unique visitors that he begins to understand how these three constants interlock in a life fully lived, and how even the deepest loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.(c)

programme.title: The Experiment
programme.desc: A psychological study is carried out and 26 men are chosen to participate. The volunteers are going to be divided into two groups: the guards and the inmates. As tension starts to rise, will the study go smoothly as planned.(c)

programme.title: King of California
programme.desc: When Charlie comes out of a mental institution because of his illness,he meets his teenage daughter Miranda. He tries to convince her that there is Spanish gold buried near by and they get closer while they search for it.(c)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Middle-aged Ben Kalmen's marriage ends with separation, in addition to a financial blow. He decides that he wants to have affairs with as much women as possible, the younger, the better. Then, he meets Jordan whose father can help him get his job back, but he doesn't realize just how much this relationship will change his life.(c)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.(c)

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: An ambitious writer achieves fame when he pens the next great American novel. His secret? The story isn't his. He soon realizes the cost of his success is much higher than expected when he has to live up to his plagiarism.(c)

programme.title: Manchester by the Sea
programme.desc: Lee Chandler is forced to go back to his hometown in Manchester when his brother, Joe, passes away after a long struggle with illness. Lee finds himself obligated to take care of Patrick, his nephew, and become his guardian until he turns eighteen.(c)

programme.title: Babel
programme.desc: As tragedy stricks a vacationing American couple in Morroco, four interlocking stories unfold across three continents, connected by a single gun.(c)

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A German/American plane goes out on a secret mission, but crashes in a forest during the Laos bombing of 1965. The plane's crew are taken as hostages and tortured by Vietcong forces. US Navy Pilot successfully plans an escape method for the hostages, but they face plenty of unforeseen events.(c)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A play-off on John Sturge's 1960 film "The Magnificent Seven". The movie is set at the end of the nineteenth century, about a group of people being held inside a ruined building because of a rough snowstorm. Rath (Kurt Russell), who works as an bounty hunter, was escorting Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh) to court and gets encountered by four strangers.(c)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Bored with his routine duties, Chris Burnett goes off course to check out a suspicious target, but when he gets spotted, Burnett becomes the target of the Serbian forces which are acting in breach of the peace treaty, and his last hope is for his commander to launch a rescue mission.(c)

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: An ambitious writer achieves fame when he pens the next great American novel. His secret? The story isn't his. He soon realizes the cost of his success is much higher than expected when he has to live up to his plagiarism.(c)

programme.title: Babel
programme.desc: As tragedy stricks a vacationing American couple in Morroco, four interlocking stories unfold across three continents, connected by a single gun.(c)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring their family members together, mum and Emma plan for a fun night that soon turns into a freakish nightmare as they cross paths with an evil witch that transforms them into monsters, a family that has a vampire, a werewolf, a mummy, and the disfigured Frankenstein's monster.(c)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: In an action-packed atmosphere, officer Danny Fisher (John Cena) apprehends Miles Jackson (Aidan Gilan), one of the most dangerous arm dealers. A year later, Miles escapes from prison and kidnaps Molly, Fisher's girlfriend, to force him to do twelve missions in his favor, otherwise he will kill her if the required tasks are not carried out in time.(c)

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: A famous lawyer, Mickey Haller, defends complex criminal cases in Los Angeles. Mickey runs the business his own way in his Lincoln, which tells that his business made him rich. Haller finds himself involved in the defense of the son of a wealthy businessman “Louis Roulet”, accused for rape and murder. A major conflict makes Haller not convinced of his client’s innocence. The lawyer turns into the investigator and opposes many influential persons’ attempts to mislead justice.(c)

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A rookie FBI agent and a wildlife agent make an unlikely team as they investigate a gruesome crime that took place on a Native American reservation.(c)

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Mikael Blomkvist is a journalist who is hired by Mr. Vanger in order to reveal the secret of his niece's murder, almost forty years ago,whose body was never found. Thus Blomkvist resorts to young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander to help him reveal the mystery.(c)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In an apocalyptic world, prisoner Jensen Ames is forced to participate in a car race that is unlike any other. It's a race between armored cars on Terminal Island. In order to win the race, you must brutalize and murder all other competitors. But what if it's merely a trap.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: As the rebels rescue Han Solo and set out to destroy the second Death Star, Luke Skywalker tries to find a way to bring his father back from the dark side.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi escape an aggressive attack during their quest for allies, and on their journey they come across the young boy, Anakin Skywalker, in whom they see a great talent that can restore balance to the Force.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie (Wahlberg), Stella (Theron) and their carefully selected team, plan a gold bar heist against their former ally-turned-enemy, Steve.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence), the quite family man and Mike Lowrey (Will Smith), the reckless ladies man are Miami policemen who are assigned to recover a $100 million drug shipment before it gets distributed and they have only 72 hours to do it.

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Gramm is a forensic psychologist whose testimony helps convict serial killer Jon Forster. As Forster's execution date looms closer, Gramm receives a call informing him that he only has 88 minutes to live.

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.(c)

programme.title: Alien³
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out on her spaceship, Ellen Ripley is launched in an escape pod that leads her to an all-male penal colony. She soon comes to realize that a new breed of the terrifying alien species that has terrorized her crew came with her, and it's out to kill the inmates.(c)

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Ricky, a corrupt cop with the dream of becoming mayor, finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at a major boxing event. He tries to uncover the shocking murder plot, which becomes more shocking upon knowing its mastermind.(c)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(c)

programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala despite the age gap. The Republic is mired in chaos and it is discovered that there is a secret clone army posing a threat to the galaxy.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.(c)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(c)

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.(c)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.(c)

programme.title: Rambo 5: Last Blood
programme.desc: John Rambo returns after many years to finish his final mission, seeking revenge on everyone who betrayed him, and a journey of dangers begins in the final chapter of Rambo's adventures.(c)

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost turns out to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is agent Matt Weston (Ryan Reynolds) who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. They must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they get to another safe house.(c)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.(c)

programme.title: Alien: Resurrection
programme.desc: The company was able to resurrect Ripley but now her DNA is mixed with the Queen. A human/ alien hybrid, she must continue her war against the aliens.(c)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
programme.desc: With their eyes on a huge ransom, a group of criminals takes the passengers on a subway train hostage to force the authorities to comply with their demands. With hostages under their mercy, they bargain with the officers who arrive to defuse the situation.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.(c)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(c)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: The story offers original tale that have been said about the bitter conflict between humans and Orcs, addressing through the events the conflict occurred between the two sides.(c)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(c)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.(c)

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Eva Lord (Eva Green) asks her ex-boyfriend Dwight (Josh Brolin) to help her escape her violent rich husband Damien Lord. But Dwight soon discovers that Eva's intention is full of evil and hatred. On the other hand, John Harrington (Bruce Willis) meets Nancy (Jessica Alba) and events escalate.(c)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: On the final days of the millennium, the Devil crashes a party in New York and possesses a man's body so that he can have his chosen bride and make her bear his child and destroy the world. It's up to an ex-cop who has lost his faith to stop him.(c)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick

Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.(c)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: In 1959, Florence Green, a free-spirited widow, risks everything to open a bookshop, but she enters into clashes with the residents who never expected to lay hands on such venturesome books.

programme.title: The Time of Their Lives
programme.desc: Former Hollywood star Helen decides to use the help of her friend, Priscilla, to travel on a trip from London to France and attend the funeral of her ex-boyfriend. Many unexpected adventures and situations make their trip unforgettable.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: In this Sci-Fi, a thunderstorm hits the world and threatens the human race, amid chaos caused by strange beings who arrived to attack Earth. Ray is a divorced father whose children are staying with him for the weekend, and he will fight till the end to protect them.(n)

programme.title: Vikings S6

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: The film follows the real life events in the life of Edward Snowden, one of America's biggest whistle blowers who left his job in the CIA and leaked thousands of classified documents to the press.(n)

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Chili Palmer returns back to the music business after years of working in the movie industry, and decides to help Edie Athens, his friend's widow, revive her late husband's record company, to pay of a debt owed to a producer. Chili depends on singer and songwriter Linda Moon's talents who asks him to help her cancel her contract with Nick Carr and Raji, who quickly become Chili's enemies.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.

programme.title: Throw Momma from the Train
programme.desc: Miserable literature teacher and author Larry and his no-less-miserable student Owen make a bizarre deal; Larry is to kill Owen’s overbearing mother, whereas Owen is to kill Larry’s evil ex-wife.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.

programme.title: The Boy, the Dog and the Clown
programme.desc: After the loss of his father, the grieving Adrien meets a clown who teaches him magical tricks. But when Adrien gets lost in the woods, magic becomes his only way to be rescued.

programme.title: Between Waves
programme.desc: Rick Gray returns to his coastal hometown, hoping that a return to his roots will help to reinvigorate him and combat his midlife crisis. As he reconnects with the friends of his youth, he embarks on a journey that will see him reevaluate his life and confront his choices.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: In this sequel, the G.I Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place.

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason and Olivia are a divorced couple trying to raise their young son, Mason Jr. The film follows the boy's life for twelve years, from first grade at age 6, till the twelfth grade, examining his relationship with his parents all the way through.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.(c)

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Three down-on-their-luck friends, Adam, Nick, and Lou, go to a winter resort and accidentally end back in 1986 after a hot tub takes them back in time to a fateful night. They have to do everything the exact same way, so that Adam's nephew can be born.(c)

programme.title: Lars and the Real Girl
programme.desc: Lars is an extremely socially awkward man who lives with his brother and his sister-in-law. One day, he announces that he now has a girlfriend, whom he met online, much to everyone’s delight, only for them to discover that it’s actually a life-size doll.(c)

programme.title: Between Waves

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The three Musketeers team up with the lively D'Artagnan to defeat the forces of evil and stop the many attempts to seize the French throne.(c)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place.(c)

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.(c)

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartment changes completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.(c)

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel meet each other through a mysterious phone call from a woman they've never met, threatening their lives and pushing them into a chain of risky situations by using modern technology and carefully monitoring their movements.(c)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A daring synthetic biologist, having lost his family in a car accident, will stop at nothing to bring them back, even if it means going up against a government-controlled laboratory and the physical laws of science.(c)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) a former professional assassin,whose peaceful life is disturbed when a thief breaks into his house, steals his car, and kills his dog. He seeks revenge on this thief, and discovers that his father is a Russian gang leader, who sets a reward for those who kill John.(c)

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: Based on his own book, this is the true story of Jordan Belfort. A stock-broker who had it all after his rise to the high life of a millionaire and lost it all after his fall involving crime and the federal government.(c)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.(c)

programme.title: Replicas

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: An eccentric professor invents strange and funny machines that ultimately do not meet his purpose. He invents a revolutionary car, which attracts the attention of a foreign government that uses trickery to get its hands on the car.(c)

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: A couple’s world turns upside down when they foster three children.(c)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Sent for a loathed assignment in the town of Punxsutawney, a self-centered weatherman finds himself stuck in a time loop as he relives the town's annual Groundhog Day festivities over and over again.(c)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.(c)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Wigand, an official at one of the largest tobacco companies, is faced with tough choices, either revealing dangerous secrets of the Tobacco industry through the TV program "60 Minutes", threatening to jeopardize his health insurance and family conditions, or to remain silent and violating his conscience.(c)

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Frank Abagnale Jr. leaves his family's home at sixteen years old, and relies upon his cheque-forging abilities to make money, making up to two and a half million dollars. During that time, FBI agent Carl Hanratty, is after Frank, who seems to be always one step ahead.(c)

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Homer Wells is a young man who was raised in a Maine orphanage, and trained by Dr. Larch to be a physician. As he leaves the orphanage, he sets out on a journey to discover the world around him.(c)

programme.title: Van Wilder 2: The Rise of Taj
programme.desc: When Van Wilder's disciple Taj graduates from college, he travels to England's Camford University where he hopes to join an elite fraternity. But when he's rejected by its snobbish leader, he joins a group of misfits and sets out to form a new fraternity.(c)

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: Calvin's adventures continue with his barber shop. Real estate developers want to buy the property in the area. He faces new competition from the beauty shop across the street , while a new barber shop called Nappy Cutz opens. Calvin tries to change the style and decorations of his own shop so that he can compete with them.(c)

programme.title: Rust Creek
programme.desc: On her way for a job interview, a college student takes a wrong turn and is stranded in the forest where she has to battle cruel forces and ruthless outlaws before she strikes a deal with a stranger to secure a way out of the woods.(c)

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the American Civil War; a mysterious gunslinger reluctantly joins a Mexican desperado to find a buried treasure, while they seek to get the better of an outlaw who's trying to beat them to the money.(c)

programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.

The Pom Pom Murders
programme.desc: After Audrey gets chosen to be a cheerleader for a basketball team, she falls for a player called Walter, whose cheerleader ex-girlfriend gets murdered. As Walter gets accused of the murder, Audrey sets out on a dicey mission to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.

programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: High Life

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(c)

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.(c)

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.(c)

programme.title: The Hummingbird Project
programme.desc: Vincent (Jesse Eisenberg) and Anton (Alexander Skarsgård) are two cousins from New York, and players in the high-stakes game of High- Frequency Trading, where winning is measured by milliseconds. They go head to head against their former boss, Torres (Salma Hayek), in a deal to build a straight fiber-optic cable line that could make them millionaires.(c)

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: A young man seeks to become an MMA fighter like his estranged father, all the while struggling not to get carried away with violence like him.(c)

programme.title: Deadwood: The Movie
programme.desc: As the townspeople gather to celebrate South Dakota's statehood, a clash over land leaves Charlie Utter dead and US Marshall Seth Bullock tries to solve the murder and protect the townspeople from Senator George Hearst.(c)

programme.title: The Convenient Groom

A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: Anniversary Nightmare
programme.desc: When she wakes up on her 10th anniversary and finds herself in Hawaii, things rapidly escalate for Liz as she finds her husband dead while she is accused of murdering him. She sets out to prove herself innocent by finding the true culprit.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: Lucy is a lonely worker at the train station,who secretly like Peter, one of the passengers . Lucy saves his life on Christmas, but then he goes into a coma. His family mistakenly thinks Lucy is his fiancée while his younger brother, Jack, suspects it, despite the whole family's admiration for Lucy.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: The British Intelligence recruits archaeologist Lara Croft on a mission to get to Pandora's box, which has the most dangerous disease known to mankind. Evil scientist Jonathan has his sights set on the box as well, and Lara Croft agrees to face him on the condition that the Intelligence release the man she is in a relationship with.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: A group of women try to take on Fox News head, Roger Ailes, due to his administration policy and the toxic male culture he is spreading in the network.

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Adapted from Nikolai Leskov's Lady Macbeth of the Mtsensk District, the movie depicts the life of a young woman stifled by her marriage of convenience to a man twice her age. Confined and left behind by her husband, she starts a romance with a young man from the estate.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A high school senior, who's treated as an outcast by her classmates, lives with her religious fanatic mother who wants to isolate her from the world. When Carrie finds out that she posses telekinetic powers, she unleashes her anger on all those who did her wrong.(c)

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Karen gives her son, Andy, an AI toy doll branded as "Buddi" for his birthday, which Andy calls "Chucky ". Andy starts to feel something is wrong with it, as it develops a very sinister mind of its own.(c)

programme.title: Mothers' Instinct
programme.desc: The Alice and Celine families live in Brussels in the 1960s, but when Celine's son dies in a tragic accident, Celine blames her neighbor Alice for not helping him, and Alice feels that her neighbor is trying to take revenge on her son Theo.(c)

programme.title: Crazy Heart
programme.desc: The life of a faded country music singer takes a turn after years of hazy days and lonely nights of singing in pubs, as a beautiful, sympathetic reporter arrives in town, writing a new vividly bright shade into the book of his colorless life.(c)

programme.title: Chocolat

programme.title: Dreamgirls

programme.desc: Mama Moo is an ordinary cow living a typical life, but she dreams to go on an adventure. When she meets Crow, she tries to get close to him, but he doesn't reciprocate the feeling.(c)

programme.title: The Emperor's Secret
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small Finnish village find themselves forced to defend their town against the tyrannical emperor who wishes to confiscate the swiveling wheel. When they resist him, he sends them to a barren island. Now, it's up to Pavo to lead them to safety and fight the evil emperor.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A group of scientists in a spaceship are exposed to a colossal amount of gamma rays, gaining supernatural power, forming a team they call (the fantastic four) using their power in the face of evil. The events continue in an exciting and interesting procedure.

programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.desc: Based in Mexico, ex-FBI agent John Creasy is hired to protect nine-year-old Pita Ramos, who gets kidnapped. Creasy swears to stop at nothing to get revenge from her kidnappers.

programme.desc: An infamous mafia family, the Manzonis, headed by Giovanni Manzoni (Robert De Niro) is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program. Written and directed by the man who made "The Fifth Element" and "Léon: The Professional.
